img.alt: CHS Students Bring Home Press Awards for GNN Submissions

a.span: CHS Students Bring Home Press Awards for GNN Submissions

div.p: GNN submissions showcase students' talents and earn state-wide awards. Click on the headline to read more on this story.

a.title: Go to comments for CHS Students Bring Home Press Awards for GNN Submissions

img.alt: Globe Students Recognized by Missouri Interscholastic Press Association

a.span: Globe Students Recognized by Missouri Interscholastic Press Association

div.p: CHS students are recognized for their journalistic works across the state of Missouri. Click the headline to read more.

a.title: Go to comments for Globe Students Recognized by Missouri Interscholastic Press Association

img.alt: CLAMO Receives National Recognition from Jostens

a.span: CLAMO Receives National Recognition from Jostens

div.p: For the third year in a row, CLAMO has been selected for its best spread and cover for outstanding yearbooks printed by Jostens. Click the headline for more on this story.

a.title: Go to comments for CLAMO Receives National Recognition from Jostens

img.alt: WMS Student Receives Honorable Mention from Leyla Beban Young Writers Foundation

a.span: WMS Student Receives Honorable Mention from Leyla Beban Young Writers Foundation

div.p: Norah Gross submits story to "$1000 for 1000 Words Writing Contest" - brings home Honorable Mention. Click the headline to read more.

a.title: Go to comments for WMS Student Receives Honorable Mention from Leyla Beban Young Writers Foundation

img.alt: District Launches Continued Learning

div.p: While the COVID-19 pandemic closes schools, students in our District continue learning. Click the headline for more on this story.

a.title: Go to comments for District Launches Continued Learning

img.alt: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates, Information and FAQs

div.p: Click the headline to review the District's ongoing communication and planning related to the coronavirus.

a.title: Go to comments for Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates, Information and FAQs

img.alt: Wildcat Robotics Team Ranks 17th in the State!

a.span: Wildcat Robotics Team Ranks 17th in the State!

div.p: The Wildcats finished 4th in their division beating last year's world champions! Click the headline for the story.

a.title: Go to comments for Wildcat Robotics Team Ranks 17th in the State!

img.alt: CHS Dance Marathon Raises over $29,000 for Charity

a.span: CHS Dance Marathon Raises over $29,000 for Charity

div.p: An entire year has been spent on fundraising for this event and culminated with the four-hour long Dance Marathon in Stuber Gym. Click the headline for more details and to view photos of the event.

a.title: Go to comments for CHS Dance Marathon Raises over $29,000 for Charity

img.alt: WMS Students Compete and Win at Missouri Math League Contest

a.span: WMS Students Compete and Win at Missouri Math League Contest

div.p: Students competed in the Missouri Math League Contest; bring home 1st and 2nd place grade rankings. Click the headline to view all rankings and awards.

a.title: Go to comments for WMS Students Compete and Win at Missouri Math League Contest

img.alt: Elementary Students Compete in MCTM Online Math Contest

a.span: Elementary Students Compete in MCTM Online Math Contest

div.p: Elementary students compete in virtual math competition and bring home awards. Click the headline for more on this story.

a.title: Go to comments for Elementary Students Compete in MCTM Online Math Contest

img.alt: Captain Teacher Named "Teacher of the Week"

a.span: Captain Teacher Named "Teacher of the Week"

div.p: The Week Junior selects a Clayton elementary teacher for "Teacher of the Week." Click the headline to read on.

a.title: Go to comments for Captain Teacher Named "Teacher of the Week"

img.alt: Coronavirus Updates/Information

div.p: Click the headline to review the District's ongoing communication about the novel coronavirus.

a.title: Go to comments for Coronavirus Updates/Information

img.alt: 2020 PTO Voters' Guide

div.p: The 2020 PTO Council Voters' Guide is now available. Click the headline to view the guide in its entirety.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 PTO Voters' Guide

img.alt: CHS Students Excel in ACES Competition

a.span: CHS Students Excel in ACES Competition

div.p: CHS students place first at regional Academic Challenge in Engineering and Science. Click the headline for more details.

a.title: Go to comments for CHS Students Excel in ACES Competition

img.alt: Initiative to Help Parents Spot Signs of Risky Behavior in their Children

a.span: Initiative to Help Parents Spot Signs of Risky Behavior in their Children

div.p: Would you recognize signs of youth alcohol or drug use in your home? The All In Clayton Coalition can help.

a.title: Go to comments for Initiative to Help Parents Spot Signs of Risky Behavior in their Children

img.alt: WMS Students Selected as Finalists in the Express The Music Competition

a.span: WMS Students Selected as Finalists in the Express The Music Competition

div.p: Hannah Moon and Vivian Wang of WMS were selected out of 476 competitive entries. Click the headline to read more.

a.title: Go to comments for WMS Students Selected as Finalists in the Express The Music Competition

span.p: This section of the website is used for posting breaking news and urgent announcements for parents, students and staff such as school closings, activity cancellations or when a school may be experiencing technical issues with its email or phone systems. This section will display this standard message if there is no breaking news or urgent announcement to report.
